data.text: @TheTalkCBS @WValderrama @ddlovato we are happy to see he is there to support her  and give her all the love she need at times like this

@TheTalkCBS Nice to hear about Wilmer visiting Demi. Friends should be there for you when your going through something. Right now she needs to be around positive people. It's all up to her right now. I wish her the best of luck.

@TheTalkCBS So many talking about looking up to #DemiLovato to save them. She’s no one’s saviour if she can’t save herself. Perhaps it’s too much pressure trying to be something she’s not. Cut ties with everyone and just save yourself. you can’t give to others what you don’t have.
@TheTalkCBS She need new friends, you can’t surround yourself with addicts that are still using.
@TheTalkCBS They still try.😛

@TheTalkCBS Circle of Influence is Crucial - especially to someone in recovery.  Too many enable, participate and manipulate but every addict wants to be told and believe he/she is in control.  It's a dangerous lie - There is no casual, no going back, it is 0 .
@TheTalkCBS I am a recovering addict myself so my heart goes out to Demi Lovato...addiction is a nightmare that you truly can not understand unless you been there.
@TheTalkCBS You do have to change your friends, but you can't blame them. Only you can help yourself.

@TheTalkCBS So based on this, you all feel that he as her friend caused her relapse.  Or her other friends? Why his picture? Most friends who caused you to fail do not show up to comfort you because they are busy getting their high. Not sure about this post
@TheTalkCBS Yeah and they did until I finally said no more.
@TheTalkCBS Give her our love!
@TheTalkCBS @ddlovato @WValderrama she need all the support she can get so very happy wilmer is by her side
@TheTalkCBS @ddlovato if those people were really her friends then they advise her to stay away from the  drugs especially someone like her who is sober
@andrewblakeames @TheTalkCBS It was some sort of opiate, for narcan to be administered.
@TheTalkCBS I think everyone has & you'd be lying if you say you never have. You have to make the conscious decision to do the right thing in life unless you just don't care!
@TheTalkCBS Yes and the best thing to do is to cut them out! #EverybodyTalks

@RaymondPrimros1 @TheTalkCBS Took the words right out of my mouth!

We as adults need to take the responsibility for our own actions and not blame it on anyone else. If we are weak enough to let ourselves be lead down bad paths then we have no one to blame but ourselves FIRST... then admit you had help.  ;)
@1107kgreen @TheTalkCBS This is so sad.😢😢😢😢😢
@TheTalkCBS I always knew he had to be a good guy.
@TheTalkCBS Yes....there's always one..even with my kids, they had some too. Thank goodness they didn't follow far. #EverybodyTalks #badfriends
@andrewblakeames @TheTalkCBS Whatever it is. We can be sure it wasn't 💧 that screwed her over.
@EmeryvilleMatty @TheTalkCBS Then you're not a friend.
@TheTalkCBS If friends motivated her back to drugs then they aren't friends. And her listening makes her a fool.
@TheTalkCBS End of the day you're an adult and the choices you make, make you the boss of your decisions. Not your friends.
@TheTalkCBS Her new song wasn't a call for help. But a celebration to being high again.
@TheTalkCBS Yes, you do have that you have to be careful at times. I think they tried to  do good for you, but they're not they're going to bring you down is called 😂😂 Jealousy, envy.
@TheTalkCBS I'm usually the one leading my friends down the wrong path. #EverybodyTalks
@TheTalkCBS Don't blame the friends. Saying  yes to something that's harmful was her choice.
@TheTalkCBS Those that try to lead you down a bad path are Not your friends. Misery loves company. #EverybodyTalks
@TheTalkCBS Please pass the word it’s NOT heroin OD.   Hate these rumors

@TheTalkCBS Yes, I have at a point that I couldn't take it anymore because I know it would bring me and my family down.
I just needed 2 meditate, clear my mind and start anew all over again. #EverybodyTalks
@TheTalkCBS Who hasn't?
